title: Collateral Damage
description: Former NXIVM members tell Kate Snow about life inside the controversial self-help group, and life since founder Keith Raniere’s conviction on charges including sex trafficking and forced labor.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
